name: Space Blaster! (yigitterol)
description:
This is the 2D Shooter Project for the Coursera Course Game Design and Development 1 - 2D Shooter

Added Features : 

  1. 2 unique new levels with different missions
  2. 5 pickups and their scripts (Key, Portal, Fire Power Up, Speed Up, Fire Rate Speed Up)
  3. Custom assests for pickups and hearts displayed on the screen.
  4. Info page that tells the player it's goal for the level

Made by : Mehmet Yiğit EROL
